name: Scary Siam Mall
description:
Scary Siam Mall is a horror game in Tha Song Mueang Plaza shopping mall. atmosphere and scary

Thai style ghost game in a shopping mall


This game is developed by Krit Bualad

Interesting Feature

  • This game requires you to find keys to unlock doors.
  • Ghosts run after us, don't come near them.
  • The next mission will go through forests and tunnels.
  • There are more batteries flashlight to collect.
  • Find the 6 digit number to unlock the door.
